ref: 11622 víkarṣati ʻ drags apart ʼ TS., ʻ draws this way and that, sets (arrow to bow) ʼ MBh. 2. vikarṣa -- m. ʻ drawing (a bow) ʼ R. 3. vikarṣaṇa -- n. ʻ dragging asunder, distributing (food) ʼ MBh. [Cf. pāṁsu -- vikarṣaṇa -- n. ʻ name of children's game ʼ MBh. -- √kr̥ṣ]
Or. beusibā ʻ to puddle in rice plants ʼ;
H. bīsnā ʻ to set out pieces in a game (e.g. chess) ʼ.
